IndexPage.heroTitle: Revolutionizing Ratings, Bridging Industries, Empowering Workers
IndexPage.heroDescription: Join the future of decentralized ratings for hotels and digital art, powered by blockchain technology
IndexPage.experience: Experience the future of ratings and reviews
IndexPage.see: See what our users have to say about their experience

emmaWilliams.content: I love how easy it is to find rating opportunities and earn rewards. The platform is intuitive and payments are always on time.
emmaWilliams.name: Emma Williams

sarahJohnson.content: CuratedHub has transformed how we receive and manage guest feedback. The blockchain verification adds a layer of trust that sets us apart
sarahJohnson.name: Sarah Johnson

michaelChen.content: The NFT rating system has helped me reach new collectors and build credibility in the digital art space.
michaelChen.name: Michael Chen

rating.content: Real-time, transparent rating system powered by verified users
rating.heading: Dynamic Star Rating

blockchain.content: Immutable records and secure transactions for all ratings
blockchain.heading: Blockchain Security

earnings.content: Earn rewards by contributing quality ratings and reviews
earnings.heading: Task-Based Earnings

integration.content: Seamlessly connect hotels and digital art marketplaces
integration.heading: Industry Integration

AboutUs.revolutionizing: We're revolutionizing the rating industry by combining blockchain technology with human expertise to create transparent, reliable, and rewarding experiences.
AboutUs.create: To create a transparent and reliable rating ecosystem that benefits all stakeholders while revolutionizing how we evaluate hotels and digital art through blockchain technology and community participation.
AboutUs.join-us: Join Us in Shaping the Future

Terms.minimum-deposit: The minimum deposit required for account reset is 100 USDT/USDC
Terms.after-completing: After completing all optimizations, users must apply for a full withdrawal before requesting an account reset.
Terms.full-withdrawal: Users can apply for full withdrawal only after completing all orders.
Terms.permitted: No withdrawals or refunds are permitted during the optimization process.
Terms.withdrawal-application: Users must submit a withdrawal application through the platform before receiving funds.
Terms.securely-stored: All user funds are securely stored in their platform account, and full withdrawal is allowed after optimization is completed.
Terms.processed-automatically: To prevent capital loss, all transactions are processed automatically by the system rather than manually
Terms.full-responsibility: In case of unexpected fund loss, the platform assumes full responsibility.
Terms.workbench-account: Each user is allowed only one workbench account.
Terms.password-disclosure: Users must not share passwords. The platform is not responsible for any loss caused by password disclosure.
Terms.passwords: It is not recommended to use birthdays, ID numbers, or mobile numbers as passwords.
Terms.password-reset: If a user forgets their login or withdrawal password, they may contact online customer service for a reset.
Terms.real-time-data: All orders processed on this platform are real-time data from actual users
Terms.platform-security: Users must maintain order confidentiality and ensure platform security.
Terms.credited-immediately: After each optimization, funds and rewards are credited immediately to the user’s account.
Terms.user-performance: The system assigns tasks randomly based on the quality of user performance.
Terms.once-assigned: Once assigned, orders cannot be canceled or skipped.
Terms.protect-user: To protect user interests, application amounts will increase based on account balances, leading to higher potential earnings.
Terms.optimization-process: Funds from lucky orders are credited after the full optimization process, not immediately.
Terms.recharge-amounts: The system assigns lucky orders based on recent recharge amounts in user accounts.
Terms.cannot-be-canceled: Lucky orders cannot be canceled or skipped once assigned.
Terms.own-deposit: Users select their own deposit amounts; the platform does not decide deposit amounts for them. It is recommended to start with an amount the user is comfortable with.
Terms.balance-displayed: If a deposit is needed due to lucky orders, users should follow the negative balance displayed in their account.
Terms.correct-wallet: Before making a deposit, users must confirm the correct wallet address with online customer service.
Terms.wrong-wallet: The platform is not responsible for losses if a user deposits funds into the wrong wallet address.
Terms.every-minute: The platform updates orders every minute. Orders that remain unoptimized for a long period cannot be uploaded to the system.
Terms.merchant-reputation: To protect merchant reputation, users must complete tasks within 8 hours to prevent complaints and order freezing.
Terms.client-provides: The client provides a wallet address for user deposits.
Terms.upgrade-to-VIP3: New users must register and sign in for 14 consecutive days or upgrade to VIP3 before using an invitation code to refer others
Terms.completed-all: If an account has not completed all optimizations, the user cannot invite others.
Terms.consecutive-days: After using an invitation code, users must sign in for 14 consecutive days.
Terms.credit-deductions: The credit value ensures users complete orders within a specified time. Failure to do so results in credit deductions.
Terms.100%-credit: A 100% credit value is required to process withdrawals.
Terms.extensive-information: The platform contains extensive information. Users are advised to contact customer service to confirm and verify their wallet address before making any deposits.
Terms.transaction-slip: After a successful deposit, users must provide a transaction slip to facilitate the update of their platform account by online customer service.
Terms.payee’s-name: The payee’s name and the transfer amount must match the provided wallet address for the payment to be processed immediately.
Terms.issues-arise: If any issues arise during the deposit process, users should contact online customer service for assistance.
Terms.market-fluctuations: The value of hotel reservation orders is adjusted based on market fluctuations.
Terms.assigned-randomly: Orders are assigned randomly, depending on the total balance in the user’s account.
Terms.increased-returns: A higher account balance results in higher-value reservation orders, leading to increased returns.
Terms.high-value-orders: Users who are concerned about handling high-value orders should avoid depositing excessive funds at the beginning.
Terms.invite-new: Users can invite new members to join the platform and earn a
Terms.platform’s-operation-hours: Users can optimize hotel reservation orders during the platform’s operational hours, which run from
Terms.further-assistance: For further assistance, click “Contact Us” on the platform to connect with online customer service.

ZodError.max-40: Can not be more than 40 characters
ZodError.max-120: Can not be more than 120 characters

ZodError.min-8: Can not be less than 8 characters
ZodError.email: Please input a valid email address
